analysis.description:
FGYCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#395-418) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 1

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#288-302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#298-299)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#63-65)
ERC20.transfersEnabled should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#65)
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#118-124) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/11/0x83d944263b422bc51d6bba5028cdc8eb95320e7f.sol#52-54) should be declared external
